summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Parks and Recreation; accepting deeds for real property in Pipers Creek Natural Area, North Beach Natural Area, Thornton Creek Natural Area (at Ravenna Avenue NE, at 25th NE, at Sandpoint Way, and at Maple Creek Ravine), Wolf Creek Ravine, Leschi Natural Area, Me-Kwa-Mooks Natural Area, Pelly Place Natural Area, Longfellow Creek Greenspace, Cheasty Greenspace (including Cheasty Boulevard and Mountain View), Kubota Gardens Natural Area, Duwamish Head Greenspace (including College Street Ravine), Kiwanis Ravine Greenspace, Arroyos Natural Area, Maple School Natural Area, Orchard Street Ravine, Thornton Creek Watershed (North Branch and South Branch), Puget Creek Greenspace, Burke-Gilman Greenway, and Ballard/Greenwood Neighborhood Open Space; and as additions to Lakeridge Park, Lawton Park, and Dearborn Park, all for open space, park, and recreation purposes.
